alert.note: Alert for Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:57PM CDT until August 11 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sac County in west central Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schaller, or 11 miles northeast of Ida Grove, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sac City, Lake View, Black Hawk Lake, Wall Lake, Schaller, Early, Wall Lake Municipal Airport, Sac City Municipal Airport, and Blackhawk Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
